page.title: 18MICHAEL HASSELL'S DAY
page.content: I wake up in the morning,get dressed,have some breakfast and go to school.We go into class for registration and the into Assembly.After we work on our Spelling and our Maths until we have milk at 10.30.After playtime,we finish our Maths and have an English lesson.At midday I have a School Dinner which costs 55p each day.Sometimes we have 'Hot Dogs' and semolina pudding.We start again at 1.15 and work at things like Geography.After play we might have games in the afternoon.If it is wet, we have Volley Ball in the hall. After school, I have my tea and, at 6.30., I might go to Portobello.We 'Break Dance'down there.I used to belong to a crew called 'Cosmic Rock'. At 9.30. I go home and go to bed
